title: Old Image Doctored to Show Pak PM Crouching as Modi Enters at 'G7'
subtitle: Pak PM Imran Khan Crouches As Modi is Welcomed at G7 Fact Check: The viral image is not from the G-7 summit, it is from WEF 2018 in Davos. The original picture also does not have Imran Khan crouching.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
An image of Prime Minister Narendra Modi being applauded by leaders from across the world as he enters the purported G-7 hall and Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan crouching amidst them has been widely circulated on social media.

“When Modiji enter in to the G-7 conferences hall everybody in the hall has given the standing welcome to him. One guy among them hides and could not either able to sit or stand. See his condition and find who..?” the post read.

The Quint also received several queries regarding the image on its WhatsApp number.
